title: Yuva Aacharya Award
description: Recognizing exemplary contributors of research and education sector. Organized by Bharat Education Excellence (BEE)

title: Global Teach Award
description: For accomplishing excellence in educational services via occupational competence and exemplary work in the field of education. Organized by AKS Education, New Delhi

title: Jyeshta Aacharya Award
description: For demonstrating excellence in teaching different subjects, showing outstanding contribution to learners and serving the community through teaching even outside formal classrooms. Organized by Bharat Education Excellence (BEE)
